metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12978 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
lib/html.php in Cacti before 1.1.18 has XSS via the title field of anexternal link added by an authenticated user.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12978` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.1.18+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.18+ds1-1').
